Class ValueCodeGeneratorDelegates

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.aot.generate.ValueCodeGeneratorDelegates
public abstract class ValueCodeGeneratorDelegates extends Object
Code generator ValueCodeGenerator.Delegate for well known value types.
Since:
6.1.2
Author:
Stephane Nicoll

  • Field Details

    • INSTANCES

      public static final List<ValueCodeGenerator.Delegate> INSTANCES
      A list of ValueCodeGenerator.Delegate implementations for the following common value types.
      • Primitive types
      • String
      • Charset
      • Enum
      • Class
      • ResolvableType
      • Array
      • List via List.of
      • Set via Set.of and support for LinkedHashSet
      • Map via Map.of or Map.ofEntries
      Those implementations do not require the ValueCodeGenerator to be scoped.

  • Constructor Details

    • ValueCodeGeneratorDelegates

      public ValueCodeGeneratorDelegates()
